price: Hakika adhabu ya Mola wako Mlezi hapana shaka itatokea.
footnotes: Hakika adhabu ya Mola wako Mlezi waliyo ahidiwa makafiri bila ya shaka itawateremkia hapana hivi wala hivi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
